author: norswap
content:
dumb question, but how are "NodeData" encoded (as in the "eth" network protocol, i.e. state tree nodes)?
couldn't find the answer on the devp2p repo

author: pipermerriam
content: I believe they are RLP encoded the same way they are stored in the trie

author: jason.carver
content: yup, you know that you've got the right encoding if the keccak hash of the encoded node equals the hash requested by `GetNodeData`
